en: She told me not to go there alone.
zh: 她告诉我不要一个人去那里。

en: She greeted me with "Good morning."
She said to me "Let's go shopping."
zh: 她对我说：“我们去购物吧。”

en: She did not so much as say "Good morning" to me.
zh: 她甚至没有对我说“早上好”。

en: They insisted on my getting the work done by tomorrow.
zh: 他们坚持要我明天完成这项工作。

en: She asked me who I thought would win the tournament.
zh: 她问我我认为谁会赢得比赛。

en: She told me that I could use her room.
zh: 她告诉我，我可以使用她的房间。

en: She asked me to write a letter to a friend of hers in Germany.
zh: 她让我给她在德国的朋友写一封信。

en: She whispered to me that she was hungry.
zh: 她悄悄地告诉我她饿了。

en: She asked me to wake her at six.
She came across to speak to me.
She didn't appear to recognize me.
She is as tall as I.
She is about as tall as me.
She has as many stamps as I.
zh: 她和我有一样多的邮票。

en: She and I have about the same number of stamps.
zh: 我和她拥有的邮票数量差不多。

en: She has about as many stamps as I do.
zh: 她拥有的邮票数量和我差不多。

en: She is as young as I am.
She speaks English as well as I.
zh: 她英语说得和我一样好。

en: She speaks English as well as I do.
zh: 她英语说得和我一样好。

en: She refused to go with me.
She is about my age.
She's about the same age as me.
She's about the same age as I am.
She has a view that is different from mine.
She lost her temper along with me.
She didn't exactly agree with me.
zh: 她不完全同意我的看法。

en: Never did I expect to see her in such a place.
zh: 我从没想过会在这种地方见到她。

en: I never expected to meet her in a place like this.
zh: 我从没想过会在这样的地方遇到她。

en: She shared her piece of cake with me.
zh: 她和我分享了她的蛋糕。

en: She treated each of us to an ice cream.
zh: 她请我们每个人吃了一个冰淇淋。

en: She took us all in with her smile.
zh: 她的笑容迷住了我们所有人。

en: She asked us to dinner.
She threw a glance at us.
She danced with a grace that surprised us all.
zh: 她跳舞的姿态优雅，让我们所有人都感到惊讶。

en: She made a beautiful dinner for all of us.
zh: 她为我们所有人做了一顿丰盛的晚餐。

en: She lives next door to us.
She steered our efforts in the right direction.
zh: 她引导我们的努力朝着正确的方向前进。

en: She turned down our proposal.
She is playing an important role in our organization.
zh: 她在我们的组织中扮演着重要的角色。

en: She will take care of everything for us.
zh: 她会为我们处理好一切。

en: She turned up her nose at our offer.
zh: 她对我们的提议嗤之以鼻。

en: She accepted our invitation.
She didn't take part in our conversation.
zh: 她没有参与我们的谈话。

en: She threatened to set our house on fire.
zh: 她威胁要烧毁我们的房子。

en: She asked us if we would like to cook.
She gave us some useful information.
zh: 她给了我们一些有用的信息。

en: She cooked vegetable soup for us.
She entertained us with an interesting episode.
zh: 她用一个有趣的片段招待了我们。

en: She sang a Japanese song for us.
zh: 她为我们唱了一首日语歌。

en: I think she is showing off her new dress to us.
zh: 我觉得她是在向我们炫耀她的新裙子。

en: She gave us some food.
She gave us something to eat.
She fixed us a snack.
She served us a good meal.
zh: 她为我们准备了一顿丰盛的饭菜。

en: She gave us a present.
She is very kind to us.
She has been a wonderful role model for us.
zh: 她一直是我们的好榜样。

en: She went away without so much as saying good-bye to us.
zh: 她一声不吭地走了，连再见都没跟我们说。

en: She made coffee for all of us.
zh: 她为我们所有人煮了咖啡。

en: She showed us a beautiful hat.
zh: 她给我们看了一顶漂亮的帽子。

en: She told us an interesting story.
zh: 她给我们讲了一个有趣的故事。

en: She cooked us a delicious dinner.
zh: 她给我们做了一顿美味的晚餐。

en: She has done us many kindnesses.
zh: 她对我们做了很多好事。

en: She asked several question of us.
zh: 她问了我们好几个问题。

en: She gave us a vague answer.
zh: 她给了我们一个含糊的回答。

en: She told us not to make a noise.
zh: 她告诉我们不要发出声音。

en: She was a girl of about our age.
zh: 她是个和我们年龄相仿的女孩。

en: She insisted on us going.
She suggested that we should start earlier.
zh: 她建议我们应该早点开始。

en: She might know that we are here.
zh: 她可能知道我们在这里。

en: She is only hard on me.
She accused me of stealing her money.
She got it into her head that I was bad-mouthing her.
zh: 她认定我在说她的坏话。

en: She demanded that I should help him.
She pointed out the mistakes I had made.
She saw me enter the store.
She went on at me for coming home late.
zh: 她因为我回家晚而责骂我。

en: She troubled herself to take me to the house I was looking for.
zh: 她费心带我去了我正在寻找的房子。

en: She sang a song, the title of which I did not know.
zh: 她唱了一首歌，我不知道歌名。

en: She came three minutes after I called.
zh: 我打电话后三分钟她就来了。

en: She got angry about my talk.
zh: 她对我的谈话感到生气。

en: She pretended not to hear me.
She insisted that I should pay the bill.
She may have called me up while I was out.
zh: 我不在的时候她可能给我打过电话。

en: She helped me pack my suitcase.
She was glad of my company.
She insisted on my seeing the doctor.
She screamed that I was to blame.
zh: 她尖叫着说我应该受到责备。

en: She defrauded me of my property.
She was leaving and was walking slowly from me.
zh: 她正在离开，慢慢地走离我。

en: She bled me of all my money.
She cheered me up when I was feeling blue.
zh: 我心情不好时，她让我振作起来。

en: She took my hint and smiled.
zh: 她领会了我的暗示，笑了。

en: She made a point of my attending the party.
She died before I arrived there.
zh: 我到达那里之前她就去世了。

en: She looks better today than when I her saw last.
zh: 她今天看起来比我上次见到她的时候好多了。

en: She lost her temper with me when I broke the cup.
zh: 我打破杯子时，她对我发脾气了。

en: She runs faster than I do.
She was scared at the sight of the dead body.
She cherished the memory of her dead husband.
zh: 她珍惜着对已故丈夫的回忆。

en: She has a claim on her deceased husband's estate.
zh: 她对已故丈夫的遗产有继承权。

en: She shuddered to see the dead cat.
zh: 她看到死猫时浑身发抖。

en: She continued writing in her diary until she died.
zh: 她一直写日记直到去世。

en: She had her first love in her memory until she died.
zh: 她一直把初恋留在记忆中直到去世。

en: She cried for hours without ceasing.
zh: 她不停地哭了几个小时。

en: She refused to accept charity.
She works as an assistant to the manager.
She demanded to see the manager.
She complained to the manager about the service.
She pared down her expenditures.
She drummed her fingers on the table.
She told her boss what she had in mind.
She told her superior what she thought.
zh: 她告诉她的上级她的想法。

en: She said she was going to have her own way.
zh: 她说她要按自己的方式行事。

en: She dared to call on him.
Does she dare to go into the forest?
She is not scared of taking big risks.
She succeeded in getting herself elected as mayor.
She called the kitten "Jaguar".
She loves her children.
She was standing among children.
She worked hard on account of her children.
zh: 她为了孩子们努力工作。

en: She read the children an amusing story.
zh: 她给孩子们读了一个有趣的故事。

en: She warned the children against playing in the street.
zh: 她警告孩子们不要在街上玩耍。

en: She sat surrounded by her children.
She is gentle with children.
She looked back on her childhood.
She found it necessary to accustom her child to getting up early.
zh: 她觉得有必要让她的孩子习惯早起。

en: She brought up her children to be truthful.
zh: 她把孩子们培养成诚实的人。

en: She allowed her child to be drowned.
zh: 她任由她的孩子被淹死。

en: She put the children to bed.
She took pains to educate her children.
zh: 她费尽心思地教育她的孩子。

en: She took great pains to raise her children.
zh: 她费尽心思地抚养她的孩子。

en: She's good at handling children.
zh: 她很擅长和孩子们打交道。

en: She bribed her child to take the bitter medicine.
zh: 她贿赂她的孩子吃苦药。

en: She laid the child down gently.
She committed her child to her aunt's care.
zh: 她把孩子托付给她的姑姑照顾。

en: She left her children in her aunt's care.
zh: 她把孩子们留在她姑姑那里照顾。

en: She set a child in the chair.
zh: 她把一个孩子放在椅子上。

en: She coaxed a smile from the baby.
zh: 她哄得婴儿露出了笑容。

en: She has given birth to five children.
She liked to take care of the children.
She quit her job to look after her child.
zh: 她辞掉了工作来照顾她的孩子。

en: She is busy with the care of her children.
zh: 她忙于照顾她的孩子们。

en: She was ashamed of her children's behavior.
zh: 她为孩子们的行为感到羞愧。

en: She cherishes the precious memories of her childhood.
zh: 她珍惜童年珍贵的回忆。

en: She was anxious about her children's health.
zh: 她很担心孩子们的健康。

en: You will never know what she went through to educate her children.
zh: 你永远不会知道她为了教育她的孩子经历了什么。

en: She is careful about her child's nutrition.
She knows well how to deal with children.
zh: 她很懂得如何与孩子们相处。

en: She is good with kids.
zh: 她很会和小孩子打交道。

en: She has a wonderful hand with children.
She is as simple as a child.
She can't stand being treated like a child.
zh: 她受不了被当成小孩子对待。

en: She was, as many of us were, very shy in her childhood.
zh: 像我们很多人一样，她小时候非常害羞。

en: She gave up everything for her children.
zh: 她为了孩子们放弃了一切。

en: She seems to have been in poor health in her childhood.
zh: 她小时候的健康状况似乎不太好。

en: She devoted herself to her children.
zh: 她把自己奉献给了孩子们。

en: She is devoted to her children.
zh: 她全心全意地爱着她的孩子们。

en: She told the child to eat up the food.
She cannot control her children.
She can't control her children.
She had an itch to see her child.
She bought a toy for her child.
zh: 她给她的孩子买了个玩具。

en: She bought a toy for the kid.
zh: 她给那孩子买了个玩具。

en: She bought a nice toy for her child.
zh: 她给她的孩子买了个漂亮的玩具。

en: Though she is a child, she can act wisely.
zh: 虽然她是个孩子，但她能明智地行事。

en: Child as she was, she was brave.
zh: 她虽然是个孩子，却很勇敢。

en: She was a child, but she was brave.
zh: 她是个孩子，但她很勇敢。

en: She loved her children alike.
Child as she was, she was not afraid.
zh: 她虽然是个孩子，却并不害怕。

en: She was a child, but she wasn't afraid.
zh: 她是个孩子，但她并不害怕。

en: Even though she was a child, she wasn't afraid.
zh: 即使她是个孩子，她也不害怕。

en: She took pains in educating the children.
zh: 她费尽心思地教育孩子们。

en: She gathered her children about her.
zh: 她把孩子们聚集在她身边。

en: She participated in the children's games.
zh: 她参加了孩子们的游戏。

en: She looked after the children.
The behavior of her children in public dismayed her.
zh: 她的孩子们在公共场合的行为让她感到沮丧。

en: She felt insecure about her children's future.
zh: 她对孩子们的未来感到不安。

en: She always pays attention to her children's behavior.
zh: 她总是注意孩子们的行为。

en: She spoke to the children in a gentle voice.
zh: 她用温柔的声音和孩子们说话。

en: She read an amusing story to the children.
zh: 她给孩子们读了一个有趣的故事。

en: She called her children into the room.
She yelled at the children to be quiet.
zh: 她冲孩子们大喊，让他们安静。

en: She made the children clean up their own rooms.
zh: 她让孩子们打扫自己的房间。

en: She got the children ready for a walk.
zh: 她让孩子们准备好去散步。

en: She was very ambitious for her children.
She made cookies for the children.
She told her children to put away their toys.
zh: 她告诉孩子们把玩具收起来。

en: She told the children an interesting story.
zh: 她给孩子们讲了一个有趣的故事。

en: She called, "Children, come downstairs."
She watched the children swimming in the pool.
zh: 她看着孩子们在游泳池里游泳。

en: She sent her children off to school.
She watched the children going back to school.
She didn't let her children go out in the rain.
zh: 她不让孩子们在雨中出去。

en: She chided her child for cutting in.
She braked hard when she saw a child run out into the road.
zh: 当她看到一个孩子跑到路上时，她猛踩刹车。

en: She was very embarrassed when her child behaved badly in public.
zh: 当她的孩子在公共场合表现不好时，她感到非常尴尬。

en: She shut the child in his room until he stopped crying.
zh: 她把孩子关在房间里，直到他不哭为止。

en: She is dealing out two apples to each child.
zh: 她给每个孩子分两个苹果。

en: She tried to break her child of the habit of lying.
zh: 她试图改掉孩子说谎的习惯。

en: She refused to let her child go out in the rain.
zh: 她不让她的孩子冒雨出去。

en: She disappeared into thin air.
She disappeared.
She did not turn up.
She is less beautiful than her sister is.
She's not as beautiful as her sister.
She doesn't study as hard as her sister.
zh: 她学习不如她妹妹努力。

en: She seems short beside her sister.
zh: 在她妹妹旁边，她显得矮。

en: She put on her sister's jeans and looked in the mirror.
zh: 她穿上她妹妹的牛仔裤，照了照镜子。

en: She is no less charming than her sister.
She is not less beautiful than her sister.
She is no less beautiful than her sister is.
She is no less charming than her older sister.
She is no less beautiful than her older sister.
She is different from her sister in every way.
zh: 她和她妹妹在各方面都不一样。

en: She is less beautiful than her sister.
She wears the same kinds of clothes as her sister.
zh: 她穿的和她妹妹一样的衣服。

en: She wears the same kind of clothes as her sister wears.
zh: 她穿的和她妹妹一样的衣服。

en: She was filled with grief at the news of her sister's death.
zh: 听到她妹妹去世的消息，她悲痛万分。

en: She left home early in the morning for fear that she would miss the first train.
zh: 她一大早就离开了家，生怕赶不上第一班火车。

en: She eats sliced raw fish.
She is out on an errand.
She takes great pleasure in her work.
zh: 她从工作中获得极大的乐趣。

en: She went on with the work.
She continued with the work.
She proceeded with the work.
Having done the work, she has nothing to do.
zh: 做完工作后，她就没事可做了。

en: They say that she quit her job.
She decided to resign her job.
She decided to resign.
She decided to resign from her job.
She decided to quit her job.
She felt a sigh of relief when she got the work done.
zh: 完成工作后，她松了一口气。

en: She said no more work.
Asked about her job, she said, "My job is too complicated to sum up in a word."
zh: 当被问及她的工作时，她说：“我的工作太复杂了，无法用一个词来概括。”

en: She was absorbed in her work.
zh: 她全神贯注于她的工作。

en: She was engrossed in her work.
zh: 她全神贯注于她的工作。

en: She shows a very positive attitude to her work.
zh: 她对工作表现出非常积极的态度。

en: She's hard at it.
She's at work, isn't she?
She lost interest in her work.
She said that her job gave her a sense of identity.
zh: 她说她的工作给了她一种认同感。

en: She's busy with her work.
She is very exact in her job.
She left the office immediately after work.
zh: 她下班后立即离开了办公室。

en: She felt a sigh of relief when the work was done.
zh: 工作完成后，她松了一口气。

en: It seems that she is not pleased with the job.
zh: 看来她对这份工作不太满意。

en: She was eased of her duties.
She died for lack of air.
She went for a walk.
She went out for a walk.
She was in the mood for a walk.
She felt like taking a walk.
She was condemned to lead a miserable life.
zh: 她注定要过悲惨的生活。

en: She shut an umbrella and began to run.
zh: 她收起雨伞，开始跑了起来。

en: She has left her umbrella behind.
She was holding an umbrella.
She may have left her umbrella on the bus.
zh: 她可能把雨伞落在公交车上了。

en: She originated a new way of playing jazz on the shamisen.
zh: 她开创了一种用三味线演奏爵士乐的新方法。

en: She left home after three days.
She goes to the supermarket every three days.
She is devoted to her three children.
zh: 她全身心投入到她的三个孩子身上。

en: She has three brothers.
She is 35 years old and in the prime of life.
She was washing the dishes.
She didn't want to wash the dishes, but she made the best of it.
zh: 她不想洗碗，但还是尽力做了。

en: She washed the dishes and she dried them.
She took some meat from the plate.
zh: 她从盘子里拿了一些肉。

en: She is willing to do odd jobs.
It took her more than three months to read through the magazine.
zh: 她花了三个多月才读完这本杂志。

en: She glanced through the magazine.
She should be charged with murder.
zh: 她应该被指控犯有谋杀罪。

en: She ran for her life to get away from the killer.
zh: 为了逃离杀手，她拼命奔跑。

en: The story goes that she was murdered.
She should have arrived late last night.
zh: 她应该昨晚深夜才到的。

en: She called me up very late last night.
zh: 她昨晚深夜给我打了电话。

en: She sat up late last night.
She stayed up late last night.
She tried to kill herself last night.
She passed away peacefully last night.
She caught a cold last night.
She called me at an unearthly hour last night.
zh: 她昨晚在半夜三更的时候给我打了电话。

en: She was robbed of her jewels last night.
She cooked vegetable soup last night.
She cooked us Chinese dishes last night.
zh: 她昨晚给我们做了中国菜。

en: She seems to have slept badly last night.
zh: 她昨晚好像睡得很不好。

en: She left the stage last year.
She had one misfortune after another last year.
She was born last year.
She traveled around the world last year.
She learned to ride a bicycle last year.
zh: 她去年学会了骑自行车。

en: She first came into contact with Japanese culture last year.
zh: 她去年第一次接触到日本文化。

en: She entered this school last year.
She bought some vegetables yesterday.
She bought vegetables yesterday.
She had her hat blown off yesterday.
zh: 她昨天帽子被风吹掉了。

en: She said she was sick yesterday, which was not true.
zh: 她说她昨天病了，但那不是真的。

en: She didn't go shopping yesterday, did she?
She saw a tall man yesterday.
zh: 她昨天看到一个高个子男人。

en: She left Tokyo for New York yesterday.
zh: 她昨天离开东京去了纽约。

en: She seems to have left for Tokyo yesterday.
zh: 她昨天好像已经去了东京。

en: She didn't visit anybody.
She left for Osaka yesterday.
She got a new CD player yesterday.
zh: 她昨天买了一个新的CD播放器。

en: She was slightly better yesterday.
She must have finished the work yesterday.
zh: 她昨天肯定完成了工作。

en: She started for Kyoto yesterday.
She came to see us yesterday.
She practiced her English pronunciation yesterday.
zh: 她昨天练习了英语发音。

en: She played tennis all day yesterday.
zh: 她昨天打了一整天的网球。

en: She left for London yesterday.
She is far better today than yesterday.
She did not show up at the party yesterday.
zh: 她昨天没有出现在聚会上。

en: She died yesterday afternoon.
She passed away yesterday afternoon.
She didn't show up at the party yesterday.
zh: 她昨天没有出现在聚会上。

en: She had a blue dress on at the party yesterday.
zh: 她昨天在聚会上穿了一件蓝色连衣裙。

en: She killed herself yesterday.
She committed suicide yesterday.
She went there yesterday.
She has been busy since yesterday.
zh: 她从昨天开始就一直很忙。

en: She visited at her aunt's yesterday.
zh: 她昨天拜访了她的姑妈。

en: She celebrated her fifteenth birthday yesterday.
zh: 她昨天庆祝了她的十五岁生日。

en: She went to the hospital yesterday.
She gave him the elbow yesterday.
Did she write in her diary yesterday?
She had nothing to do yesterday.
She is excellent in composition.
She was robbed of her purse.
She earns a living as a writer.
She kept a tight rein on the purse strings.
For all her wealth, she does not look happy.
zh: 尽管她很富有，但她看起来并不快乐。

zh: 她关掉了灯，这样她就可以欣赏月光了。

en: She writes to me once a month.
zh: 她每个月给我写一次信。

en: She writes to her pen pal in London twice a month.
zh: 她每月给在伦敦的笔友写两次信。

en: She turned away in horror at the sight of blood.
zh: 她看到血，惊恐地转过身去。

en: She fainted when she saw blood.
She felt faint at the sight of blood.
She was a Brown before her marriage.
She was a Brown before she got married.
She was a Smith before her marriage.
She was a Smith before she got married.
She blames me for the fact that our married life isn't going well.
zh: 她把我们婚姻生活不顺利归咎于我。

en: She was dressed all in white for the wedding.
zh: 她婚礼时全身穿着白色。

en: She was a bridesmaid at the wedding.
She is dependent on her parents even after her marriage.
zh: 即使结婚后，她仍然依赖父母。

en: She refuses to abandon her career for marriage.
zh: 她拒绝为了结婚而放弃事业。

en: She is too young to marry.
She's too young to get married.
She is not about to get married.
She's not the marrying type.
zh: 她不是适合结婚的类型。

en: I have half a mind to marry her.
Her marriage brought happiness to her parents.
zh: 她的婚姻给她的父母带来了幸福。

en: She went to college after she got married.
I wonder if she is married.
zh: 我想知道她是否结婚了。

en: She isn't married.
Is she married?
She will be happy when she gets married.
She is disposed to get married.
I hope to marry her.
She didn't come after all.
She ended up getting married to him.
She didn't buy the ticket after all.
She went back to England in the end.
She didn't telephone after all.
zh: 她最终还是没有打电话。

en: She did not turn up after all.
She was satisfied with the result.
She is by no means polite.
She is no ordinary student.
zh: 她不是一个普通的学生。

en: She is by no means beautiful.
She can never keep a secret.
She is by no means angelic.
She is far from honest.
She was by no means happy.
She is no stranger to me.
She is never late for school.
She is proud of never having been late for school.
zh: 她为自己从不迟到而感到自豪。

en: She is anything but a singer.
She is by no means selfish.
She is by no means stupid.
She protested to me that she had never done such a thing.
zh: 她向我抗议说她从未做过这样的事。

en: She would by no means tell a lie.
I cannot help loving her in spite of her many faults.
zh: 尽管她有很多缺点，我还是忍不住爱她。

en: I like her all the better for her faults.
She is none the less beautiful for her faults.
zh: 她虽然有缺点，但仍然很漂亮。

en: She was fired on the grounds that she was often absent.
zh: 她因为经常旷工而被解雇了。

en: She was beside herself with rage.
She cried and cried, but no one came to comfort her.
zh: 她哭啊哭，但没有人来安慰她。

en: Overwork caused her to be absent from work for a week.
zh: 过度劳累导致她缺席工作一周。

en: She inquired directions from the policeman.
She asked the police for protection.
She was arrested by the police.
I think she is withholding information from the police.
zh: 我认为她对警察隐瞒了信息。

en: She altered her plans.
She directed the planning of the project.
She majored in economics.
She absented herself from the lesson.
She works as hard as her siblings.
zh: 她和她的兄弟姐妹一样努力工作。

en: She adores her elder brother.
She adores her older brother.
She said to her brother, "I will tell on you."
zh: 她对她的哥哥说：“我要告你。”

en: She visited her husband in prison.
zh: 她去监狱探望了她的丈夫。

en: Does she know you?
She is two years older than you.
She has not so much patience as you.
She doesn't have as much patience as you do.
She is contemptuous of your ambition.
She is anxious about your health.
She has anxiety for your safety.
She will be a good companion for you.
She did so for her own sake, not for your sake.
zh: 她那样做是为了她自己，不是为了你。

en: She knows your mother very well.
My sister has three times as many books as I do.
zh: 我姐姐的书是我的三倍。

en: She has three times as many dictionaries as you do.
Did she show you the picture?
She is as tall as you.
She is almost as tall as you.
She left here long before you arrived.
zh: 她在你到达之前很久就离开了这里。

en: She is not such a girl as you imagine.
zh: 她不是你想象的那种女孩。

en: She is not what you suppose her to be.
She is not the kind of person you think she is.
zh: 她不是你认为的那种人。

en: She is not what you think she is.
She froze at the sight of the bear.
She bought two pairs of socks.
She mended her socks.
She manages a shoe store.
She had her shoes shined.
zh: 她让人把她的鞋擦亮了。

en: She laced her shoes.
She spends a lot of money on shoes.
She was hungry enough to eat anything.
She looked up at the sky.
She parked her car in a vacant lot.
zh: 她把车停在了一块空地上。

en: She must have been sick.
Her hair grayed with suffering.
zh: 她的头发因痛苦而变白了。

en: She was racked with pain.
She had no difficulty in learning the poem by heart.
zh: 她毫不费力地就记住了这首诗。

en: She screamed in agony.
She is away in Kyushu.
She got on the subway at Ginza.
She continued her job in the bank.
She married a bank clerk.
zh: 她嫁给了一个银行职员。

en: She intended to withdraw all her savings from the bank.
zh: 她打算从银行取出她所有的存款。

en: She drew out the money from the bank.
She covers Wall Street.
She is always thinking of moneymaking schemes.
zh: 她总是想着赚钱的计划。

en: She thinks of nothing but making money.
zh: 她满脑子想的都是赚钱。

en: She was a girl with golden hair.
zh: 她是一个有着金色头发的女孩。

en: She is a blonde girl.
She screamed and fainted.
She married a rich old man.
zh: 她嫁给了一个有钱的老头。

en: She was married to a rich man.
She married a rich merchant.
She was brought up in a rich family.
zh: 她在一个富裕的家庭长大。

en: She taught rich Indian girls.
She seems rich.
For all her riches, she's not happy.
zh: 尽管她很富有，但她并不快乐。

en: She married a rich man.
She is a wealthy woman.
She's rich.
She is rich, and what is better, very beautiful.
zh: 她很富有，而且更好的是，非常漂亮。

en: She must have been rich.
She is said to have been rich.
It is said that she is rich.
Rich as she is, she is not happy.
zh: 尽管她很富有，但她并不快乐。

en: She is rich but he is poor.
She is rich, but he is twice as rich.
zh: 她很富有，但他比她富有两倍。

en: She is not rich enough to waste money.
zh: 她还没富到可以浪费钱的地步。

en: She paid to attend the concert.
She liked throwing her money about.
She knows the art of making money.
She tried to touch the golden crane.
zh: 她试图触摸那只金色的鹤。

en: She refused to take the money.
She only worked for the sake of money.
She had an unnatural desire for money.
zh: 她对金钱有一种不正常的渴望。

en: She buys what she wants regardless of the cost.
zh: 她买东西不考虑价格，想要什么就买什么。

en: She is badly off.
She thinks money and happiness are the same.
zh: 她认为金钱和幸福是一回事。

en: Her lack of money kept her from going with me.
zh: 她因为缺钱而不能和我一起去。

en: She didn't have any money, so she couldn't go with me.
zh: 她没钱，所以不能和我一起去。

en: She took a typical example of modern music.
zh: 她举了一个典型的现代音乐的例子。

en: She attracted all the young men in the neighborhood.
zh: 她吸引了附近所有的年轻男子。

en: She fell into conversation with her neighbors.
She shops at a local grocer.
zh: 她在当地的食品店购物。

en: She was different from most women in the neighborhood, for she was able to read and write.
zh: 她和附近的大多数女性不同，因为她能读会写。

en: She has put on weight recently.
She keeps him at arm's length these days.
zh: 这些日子她对他很疏远。

en: She is going to learn how to drive.
She wants to extend the no-smoking area.
She broke herself of the habit of smoking.
She gave up smoking.
She quit smoking.
She has a well-proportioned figure.
She's accounted diligent.
She was astonishingly beautiful.
She looked stupefied in amazement.
She forgave me for breaking her mirror.
zh: 她原谅了我打碎她的镜子。

en: She looked at herself in the mirror.
She stood before the mirror.
She stood in front of the mirror.
She stopped before the mirror to admire herself.
zh: 她在镜子前停下来欣赏自己。

en: She was brushing her hair in front of a mirror.
She smiled at herself in the mirror.
zh: 她在镜子里对着自己微笑。

en: She saw herself in the mirror.
zh: 她在镜子里看到了自己。

en: She turned over the page with excitement.
She jumped about in excitement.
She looked excited.
Aside from fright she was not injured.
zh: 除了受到惊吓，她没有受伤。

en: She was only frightened, not injured.
zh: 她只是受到了惊吓，没有受伤。

en: She heaved her chest.
She read the letter with her heart beating fast.
She felt her heart turn over in her chest.
zh: 她感到心在胸腔里翻了个个儿。

en: She pressed the child to her breast.
zh: 她把孩子紧紧地抱在怀里。

en: Her viewpoint is limited.
She can only view things in a narrow scope.
zh: 她只能在狭隘的范围内看待事物。

en: She committed suicide by jumping off the bridge.
She wants to engage in teaching.
She went into teaching.
She was standing in the front of the classroom.
She earns her living by teaching.
She looks like a teacher.
She will be a teacher.
She isn't cut out for teaching.
She sat beside me in church.
zh: 她在教堂里坐在我旁边。

en: She emphasized the importance of education.
zh: 她强调了教育的重要性。

en: She adapted her teaching method to slow learners.
zh: 她调整了教学方法以适应学习慢的学生。

en: She laughed to cover her fear.
zh: 她用笑声掩饰自己的恐惧。

en: She uttered a scream of terror.
zh: 她发出了一声恐怖的尖叫。

en: She looks pale with fear.
She turned pale with fear.
She screamed with terror.
Fear fell upon her.
She fainted with fear.
She went crazy with fear.
She was pale with fear.
She threw her arms around him in horror.
She was trembling with fear.
She trembled with fear.
Her hair stood on end at the sight of the horrible accident.
zh: 看到那可怕的事故，她吓得毛骨悚然。

en: She was scared to cross the road.
She was afraid to cross the road.
She looked away terrified.
She was afraid to pass through the woods.
She forced me to go out with her.
zh: 她强迫我和她一起出去。

en: She was dumb with fear.
She is obstinate.
She's stubborn.
She is stubborn.
She had her hat blown off by the strong wind.
She's a woman of strong character.
zh: 她是个性格坚强的女人。

en: She was none the worse for drinking spirits.
zh: 她喝了烈酒后安然无恙。

en: She ran second.
She was from Kyoto, as was evident from her accent.
zh: 她是京都人，从她的口音可以明显看出。

en: She went to Kyoto, didn't she?
She will visit her uncle in Kyoto next week.
zh: 下周她将去京都拜访她的叔叔。

en: She visited not only Kyoto but also Nara.
zh: 她不仅去了京都，还去了奈良。

en: She fried fish in salad oil.
She's only interested in fish and cockroaches.
zh: 她只对鱼和蟑螂感兴趣。

en: She hates fish and never eats any.
She hung a little Picasso on the wall of the drawing room.
zh: 她在客厅的墙上挂了一幅小小的毕加索画作。

en: She married him last year.
She was out of Japan last year.
She graduated from high school last year.
She got married last year.
She can't do without milk.
As soon as she got her salary, she spent it all.
zh: 她一拿到工资就花光了。

en: She gets a high salary.
She gets paid a lot.
She invited two of her classmates - Jane and Mary.
zh: 她邀请了两个同学——简和玛丽。

en: She steeled herself not to cry.
She kept on crying.
She began crying.
She started to cry.
She started crying.
She began to cry.
She is calm now; she has stopped crying.
zh: 她现在冷静了，她不哭了。

en: In tears, she tore up his letter and threw it away.
zh: 她含着眼泪，撕毁了他的信，扔掉了。

en: She felt like crying.
She choked her utterance with sobs.
She tried not to cry.
She tried in vain not to cry.
zh: 她极力忍住不哭，但失败了。

en: She was watching the film with her eyes red in tears.
zh: 她含着眼泪看电影，眼睛都红了。

en: She does nothing but cry.
She kissed away the boy's tears.
She made her crying baby drink some milk.
zh: 她让哭闹的婴儿喝了些牛奶。

en: She cried.
Her proficiency in English rapidly improved.
zh: 她的英语水平迅速提高。

en: She was aging quickly.
She flared up with anger.
She burst into laughter.
She suddenly burst in on our conversation.
zh: 她突然闯入我们的谈话。

en: She broke into tears.
She broke away crying.
She could not help bursting into tears.
She is apt to fits of depression.
She cleaned her room in a hurry.
zh: 她匆匆忙忙地打扫了房间。

en: She came hurrying to his bedside.
zh: 她匆匆忙忙地来到他的床边。

en: She came around to my house.
She quickly went up the stairs.
She hastened to deny the story.
zh: 她赶紧否认了这个故事。

en: She guided me to the palace.
She talked her husband into having a holiday in France.
zh: 她说服了她的丈夫去法国度假。

en: She will often go shopping on holidays.
She is now on vacation.
She came over to France for a holiday.
She spent a good deal of money on her vacation.
zh: 她在度假上花了很多钱。

en: She is impatient for her holidays.
She was taken ill on holiday and had to find a doctor.
zh: 她在度假时生病了，不得不找医生。

en: She was taken ill on holiday.
She was out of breath from walking up and down hills.
zh: 她因为爬山而气喘吁吁。

en: She stood on her head.
She gave her guests a hearty reception.
zh: 她热情地接待了她的客人。

en: She is careful about the way she receives guests.
zh: 她很注意她接待客人的方式。

en: She showed the visitor her baby.
zh: 她给来访者看了她的宝宝。

en: She cleaned her room before her guests arrived.
zh: 在客人到来之前，她打扫了她的房间。

en: She put her room in order before her guests arrived.
zh: 在客人到来之前，她把房间整理好了。

en: She was prohibited from smoking.
She has a bad habit of smoking.
She argues for the sake of arguing.
She argues just for the sake of arguing.
zh: 她只是为了争论而争论。

en: She addressed herself to the chairperson.
She talked to the chairman.
She talked to the chairperson.
She was named as chairman.
She was appointed chairperson.
She performed her duties.
She regarded me suspiciously.
She was driven to stealing by hunger.
zh: 她因饥饿而被逼去偷窃。

en: She had bright black eyes.
zh: 她有一双明亮的黑眼睛。

en: She dreaded having to tell him what had happened.
zh: 她害怕不得不告诉他发生了什么事。

en: She got up late.
She bore the air of a lady.
She looked puzzled at the abrupt question posed by a reporter.
zh: 她对记者提出的突兀问题感到困惑。

en: She looked at the picture to refresh her memory.
zh: 她看着照片来唤醒她的记忆。

en: She's good at getting around rules.
zh: 她很擅长钻规则的空子。
